snippet.title: Todd's Adventures in Slime World for Sega Genesis
snippet.description:
I do not like to swear in my descriptions.  But this here, this is bullshit.

The kindest way to describe this game is "completely unfair".  There is NO indication of where any of these instant death traps are, you just need to stumble into all of them.  And when you finally get that jetpack, you can't find the way out. (after the video ended, I found the way forward on the first screen).

The other modes add other twists to the game, but they're all just as unfair, you're just raped by normal enemies as well as hidden instant death traps.  Except Easy, which is too boring to play.

Avoid this damn game.
